name: Planspot
tag_list: event-marketing, events, marketing, advertise, social-media, mailing-tool
overview:
Planspot is an all-in-one event marketing tool to run campaigns across social media, magazines, blogs and newsletters.

An event created on Planspot is directly published to social media, magazines, newspapers and press. Planspot then fetches all tweets, comments and attendees, enabling organizers to actively engage and promote their events on social media.

Planspot includes a mailing tool specifically tailored to the event industry. For each event Planspot generates a mailing templates including all event information, sales and Facebook attend link.

All activity around events are tracked and shown in a dashboard so event organizers can actively monitor and run their campaign.

Publishers can become Planspot Media Partners, offering their medium for event promotion and charge organizers for using it. Planspot currently matches each event to about 450+ Media Partners, making sure it is promoted to the right audience. Planspot simplifies the editor’s or sales job of searching audience tailored events, resulting in having more time for core business instead.
